details.description: Get contact details for Official Receivers in England and Wales
details.more_information: You can't get debt advice from an Official Receiver. For debt advice contact [Citizens Advice](http://www.adviceguide.org.uk/index/get_advice.htm "Find your local Citizens Advice Bureau"){:rel="external"} or the [National Debtline.](http://www.nationaldebtline.co.uk/ "National Debtline"){:rel="external"}
details.introduction:
Get contact details for Official Receivers in England and Wales. 

Official Receivers manage the first stages, at least, of an insolvency case. For example, they:

+ collect and protect assets for creditors after you've been made bankrupt
+ organise your discharge from bankruptcy

details.description: Includes bankruptcy, business finance and recovering debt
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
Includes recovering debts, registering for bankruptcy and as a creditor
Includes VAT, debt and inheritance tax
Bankruptcy is one way of dealing with your debts - bankruptcy register, bankruptcy forms and fees, petition the court, restrictions, discharge and your assets
